goodbye: Y'all come back now, ya hear?

shoppinglist.languagePrompt: First thang ya gotta do is pick yer language and yer desired startin' page, so we can mosey on with Murmli.
shoppinglist.welcome:
Howdy there, welcome to Murmli, yer trusty app for recipes, shoppin', and eatin' right.

 This here app uses some fancy AI to help with translatin', interpretin', and choosin' recipes. You can even whip up yer own recipes and plop 'em right onto yer shoppin' list to make life a tad easier.
shoppinglist.quickGuide:
Just type what ya need in the input box, and Murmli will add it to the shoppin' list with a lil' help from AI.

 All items get sorted by supermarket categories, so y'all can find 'em easier.

 Once items are added, y'all can click on 'em to find alternatives.
shoppinglist.options: Find more options like sharin' or sortin' yer list in the menu (up yonder to the right). Share the list with yer partner, for instance, to work on it together. Y'all can revoke the sharin' anytime.

planner.welcome: Set below how many folks and how many recipes y'all wanna plan for. In the text field, ya can also type yer wishes in plain ol' English, and the AI will consider 'em when pickin' recipes (like vegetarian for athletes).
planner.options:
Now, recipes will be shown to ya. 
Give a thumbs up if ya like a recipe, or a thumbs down if ya don't.

The system learns from yer choices to make better suggestions.
planner.shoppinglist:
Once ya picked the number of recipes ya want, you'll be taken to the shoppin' list. It includes all the ingredients for the recipes.

 Under 'Recipes', you'll find yer chosen recipes with instructions. There, ya can rate and give feedback on the recipes.

recipes.overview: Here's the rundown of the recipes that belong to yer shoppin' list, yer own recipes, and yer favorites. From there, ya can call 'em up.
recipes.create: On the plus sign up yonder to the right, ya can create yer own recipes. Type in yer idea, the AI will whip it up, and ya can upload a picture of the ingredients.
recipes.addToList: If ya wanna add one of yer recipes or favorite recipes to yer shoppin' list, call up the recipe and add it through the menu (three dots) up yonder to the right.

tracker.overview:
Just jot down what ya ate.

You can describe it in plain ol' English, like “a plate of pasta”, name specific products, or give exact calorie counts – however ya like.
tracker.calorieGoal:
Set yer daily calorie goal yerself or let us calculate it for ya.

Just enter yer body data once – we'll handle the rest for ya.
tracker.activityTracking: Also track yer sporty activities, like “20 minutes joggin'”. We'll automatically calculate how many extra calories ya can consume – just for ya.

setup.aboutApp: This app was privately developed to make life easier with a shoppin' list and smart recipe plannin'.

general.errorMessage: An error done occurred. Please try again shortly or let us know 'bout the issue.

deleteRecipeDialog.dialogMsg: Are ya sure ya wanna remove the selected recipe?

general.name: Name

shoppingList.notesHint: Yer notes will be saved automatically
shoppingList.noItemsMessage: Ain't no items in the shoppin' list.
shoppingList.joinedList: Ya done joined a stranger's list.
shoppingList.noSharedUsers: The list ain't been shared yet.

sortCategoriesDialog.title: Sort Categories
sortCategoriesDialog.text: Click on a category to set a position, or use the arrows.

removeRecipes.dialogMsg: Are ya sure ya wanna remove all recipes from yer shoppin' list? The ingredients will stay on the list and need to be deleted separately.

removeIngredients.dialogMsg: Are ya sure ya wanna remove all ingredient-related entries from yer shoppin' list? The recipes will remain in the recipe view.

clearAll.dialogMsg: Are ya sure ya wanna remove all items from yer shoppin' list?

deleteList.dialogMsg: Are ya sure ya wanna delete yer entire shoppin' list?

shoppingList.voiceRecordingInfo: The voice recordin' is currently runnin'. Ya can say in plain ol' English what ya want on yer shoppin' list. Yer request will be processed and sent. If ya wanna discard the recordin', ya can delete it. As long as ya don't send the recordin', it stays local on yer device.

planner.title: Recipe Planner
planner.fetchingMessage: Yer recipes are bein' loaded in the background. Please hold on.

resetSelectionDialog.dialogMsg: Are ya sure ya wanna reset yer recipe selection?

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.empty: Ya ain't created no recipe yet.
recipes.noFavorites: Ya ain't got no favorites yet.

createRecipeDialog.title: Generate Recipe
createRecipeDialog.text:
Describe yer recipe as detailed as possible: What must be included, what do ya wanna avoid? The more info ya give, the better we can whip up yer custom recipe.

After the creation process, it takes about 2–3 minutes for yer recipe to appear under 'My Own Recipes'.

Optionally, ya can add a photo – either from yer gallery or by takin' a new picture. Could be a picture of yer fridge, individual ingredients, or somethin' that reminds ya of yer desired recipe.
createRecipeDialog.generatingText: Yer recipe is bein' created. This might take up to two minutes. Afterward, you'll find it under 'My Own Recipes'.

recipes.addIngreditensInfo: Are ya sure ya wanna add the recipe to yer current shoppin' list? All ingredients will be added automatically.
recipes.processingMessage: Yer recipe is bein' created in the background. You'll be notified when it's ready.
recipes.downloadSelectedPdf: Selected recipes as a PDF, y'all

tips.swipeToRemove: Just swipe a recipe ta the left or ta the right to get rid o' it.
tips.createOwn: Hit the plus sign up yonder on the right an' y'can make yer own recipes.
tips.printPdf: Wanna print yer recipes? Use the three-dot menu down on the right an' y'can create a PDF.
tips.editOwn: You can edit yer own recipes anytime. Open the recipe an' use the three-dot menu — you'll find all the options there.
tips.feedbackPlanner: Not feelin' a recipe from the planner? Open it an' leave feedback through the three-dot menu — we'll take care o' it.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.label: Yer Feedback
feedback.success:
Thank ya kindly for yer feedback!
We'll take care of it.

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirmDeleteText: Are ya sure ya wanna permanently delete yer account? This action can't be undone.
settings.importWarningText: Importin' will overwrite all current user data and you'll be logged out. Do ya wanna continue?

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Reach us through the followin' channels
contact.footer: We look forward to hearin' from ya!

tracker.createActivityInfo: Add yer activities here, the app will calculate the calories for ya automatically.

palOptions.homeOffice: Home Office – sittin', no physical activity
palOptions.salesperson: Salesperson – standin', walkin', light physical work
palOptions.waiter: Waiter – lots of walkin', carryin' plates
palOptions.constructionWorker: Construction Worker – physically demandin', liftin', carryin'
palOptions.farmer: Farmer – physical work, liftin', operatin' machinery
palOptions.constructionSite: Construction Site – heavy physical work, liftin', standin'
palOptions.mountainGuide: Mountain Guide – extreme activity, long walkin' in terrain

tracker.bodyDataInfo: Here ya can enter yer body data to calculate yer calorie goals. These are used to determine yer daily calorie targets.
tracker.errorNoBodydata: If ya wanna use the calorie calculator, ya need to enter yer body data first.
tracker.errorBodydataActivity: If ya wanna use activity trackin', ya need to enter yer body data first.
tracker.voiceRecordingInfo:
The recordin' is saved locally on yer device. If ya wanna send the audio file, click Send.
Alternatively, ya can click Discard to not send the recordin'.
tracker.askDialog: Here ya can ask questions about nutrition. The app will try to answer yer question, considerin' yer body data and yer calorie counter entries from the past 14 days. Please note that the answers are based on the information ya entered in the app.
tracker.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe yer meal or activity 'bout the picture

trainingPlans.title: Trainin' Plans

step1.title: Create a Trainin' Plan
step1.content: Trainin' plans can be created individually, ya can describe exactly what ya want, what ya are trainin' for, where, how often in the week, and how intense/long.

step2.title: Edit Trainin' Plan
step2.content: If somethin' ain't right, ya can edit the trainin' plans with plain ol' English. Just write what needs changin', and ya'll get an updated version.

step3.title: Train
step3.content: Trainin' plans go by time, if they are activated. Active trainin' plans can be trained and logged, each set individually – weights or repetitions or duration of sets. At the end, ya have the option to send the trainin' directly to the calorie counter to track the calories burned.

trainingPlans.createPlanInstructions:
Describe yer plan as precisely as possible: What do ya wanna train? How often in the week? In what environment? What type of trainin' do ya prefer?

Ya can also state the intensity: light, moderate, or intense.

Examples:
'I wanna go to the gym four times a week, focusin' on upper body. I'm well-trained.'

'I have back pain on the left side of my shoulder. Create me a plan with targeted exercises for one day a week to improve my posture and ease the pain.'

The more information ya provide, the more suitable yer trainin' plan will be.
trainingPlans.subtitle: Here ya can create and manage yer trainin' plans.
trainingPlans.confirmDeletePlan: Are ya sure ya wanna delete this trainin' plan?
trainingPlans.noPlans: Ya ain't created no trainin' plans yet.
trainingPlans.noPlansInfo: Ain't no trainin' plans yet. Ya can add a new trainin' plan with the plus button up yonder to the right.

activateDialog.title: Activate Trainin' Plan
activateDialog.msg:
When ya start yer trainin' plan, the start date will be set. Then you'll see which week of yer trainin' plan yer in.
Are ya sure ya wanna start the trainin' plan?

deleteDialog.title: Delete Trainin' Plan
deleteDialog.msg: Are ya sure ya wanna delete this trainin' plan?

finishDialog.title: Finish Trainin'
finishDialog.msg: If ya finish the trainin', the start date and all yer progress will be reset. Are ya sure ya wanna finish the trainin'?

trainingPlans.processingMessage: Yer trainin' plan is bein' created in the background. You'll be notified when it's ready.
trainingPlans.askDialog: You can ask questions 'bout this trainin' plan. The last trainin' logs (up to 10) will be sent along.
trainingPlans.continuePlanDescription: Go on an' make a new plan based on this here trainin' plan. You can, if y'all like, add any optional wishes.

training.title: Trainin' Log
training.noPlan: Ain't no trainin' planned for today or the plan don't include no exercises.
training.cancelTrainingConfirm: Do ya really wanna cancel the trainin'?
training.useLastValue: Go on an' put in the last value ({value})
